DEFAULTS.Font = FONTS.Roboto

let report = new PDFReport()
    .content(
        builder.Text("Hello PDF"),
        builder.Column(
            builder.Row(
                builder.Text("Header 1").props({ bold: true }),
                builder.Text("This is large content!! ")
            ),
            builder.Row(
                builder.Text("Header 2").props({ bold: true }),
                builder.Text("This is large content")
            )
        )
    );

report.createPDF().then(pdf => {

    window.PDF = pdf

    // pdf.open()
    // pdf.print()
})
